titleStmt.title: An exposition of the ten commandements of God vvherein the principall and most materiall doctrines are set downe; by Edvvard Elton, bachelor in diuinitie, and preacher of Gods word at Saint Marie Magdalens Barmondsey neare London.
Plaine and easie exposition of sixe of the commandements of God in tables
titleStmt.author: Elton, Edward, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at the great South-doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Another issue, with additions and cancel title page of Elton, Edward. A plaine and easie exposition of sixe of the commandements of God in tables.
A1, title page, is a cancel; C8 and R4, probably blanks, lacking.--Folger Shakespeare Library catalogue.
Printed by R. Field. Cf. STC.
Imperfect: item at reel 1727:21 has pages torn with some loss of print and t.p. defaced.
Appears at reel 643 (Folger Shakespeare Library) and at reel 1727 (Harvard University. Library).
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and G.B. Evans Collection, Harvard University Library.
